title: Modernization of Infrastructure Facilities of Multi Storeyed Housing Schemes
decision_details:
The proposal made by Hon. Sajith Premadasa, Minister of Housing and Samurdhi, to renovate the public roads and rain water drainage systems in the following 13 Housing Schemes where 1700 families reside, at a cost of Rs.143.29 million, under the Programme of Modernization of Infrastructure Facilities of Multi Storeyed Housing Schemes in Colombo City, was approved by the Cabinet. 

Bolamesawatta Housing Scheme
Veluwanarama Housing Scheme
Elvitigala Housing Scheme
Mallikarama Housing Scheme
Central Road Housing Scheme
Kammalwatta Housing Scheme
Jumma Masjid Housing Scheme
Dissanayakewatta Housing Scheme
Aluth Mawatha Housing Scheme
Dias Place Housing Scheme
Bloemandhal Housing Scheme
St. James Street Housing Scheme
Aluthkada Housing Scheme
